snippet.title: Final Fight 2 (SNES) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A playthrough of Capcom's 1993 Super NES beat 'em up, Final Fight 2.

Played through on the Expert difficulty level with Haggar.

It's exactly what the title would imply - in every tangible way it's an upgrade over the original SNES game - it allows for 2-player simultaneous co-op play, it has three selectable characters, broader movesets, and a larger variety of enemies. 

I do really like this game, but still - despite the obvious leap forward all of the mechanics in the game made over the first, I can't help but favor Final Fight. It just has a lot more character (or is it nostalgia) in my opinion? Either way, it's a great beat 'em up for anyone that enjoys arcade brawlers, and this one is a console exclusive (just like the third, and final canonical game in the series, was).

__________
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!
